message: “The statistics show 99.9 % of the victims never make it home, so any opportunity that we have to get a loved one back to their family we need to capitalize on that,” said Tony Ardis of the PFD.

data.description: “Human trafficking is a concern for every community big or small, it endangers public health and fuels violence and organized crime,” said Joyce Derenzy Associate Executive Director at the Center for Prevention of Abuse.
data.title: Peoria Fire Department taking initiative on human trafficking
